title: Divinity: Original Sin’s Launch Trailer Makes You Want to Pick up a Controller
text:
Divinity: Original Sin’s Launch Trailer Makes You Want to Pick up a Controller 
Published By: EntertainmentBuddha.com - Today 
It’s not often that a CRPG makes you want to sit down on the couch, kick your feet up, and start playing on a console. Divinity: Original ...
